Package controller.utils

Class ImageUtilsImpl

  • java.lang.Object
    • controller.utils.ImageUtilsImpl
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    ImageUtils 
    public class ImageUtilsImpl
extends java.lang.Object
implements ImageUtils
    Utility class for the image processing. This helper class will help to process various kinds of operations on the image like save and read.

      • readPPMImage

        public java.io.InputStream readPPMImage​(java.lang.String path)
                                 throws java.io.FileNotFoundException,
                                        java.io.IOException
        Given method will read the ppm image from the specified path and return a new image object.

        It reads image in pixels format. Also, save their width, height and maxvalue.

        Specified by:
        readPPMImage in interface ImageUtils
        Parameters:
        path - file path provided to read the file
        Returns:
        image in form of input stream
        Throws:
        java.io.FileNotFoundException
        java.io.IOException
